data.name: confirm_privacy_policy
data.value: I confirm that I have read, understand and agree to the privacy policy.

data.name: key_points
data.value: Key points of the privacy policy:

data.name: key_point_1
data.value: we’ll share your information with the relevant environmental regulator and scheme administrator

data.name: key_point_2
data.value: we may add your organisation’s name, address and contact details to the packaging public registers

data.name: key_point_3
data.value: we’ll keep your personal data for 7 years after the end of each compliance year

data.name: privacy_policy_not_approved
data.value: You must accept the Privacy Policy in order to continue with Scheme Registration

data.name: read_privacy_policy
data.value: Read the full privacy policy (opens in new tab)
